text:
Bad news: AI is replacing half the consultants.

Good news: ChatGPT isn't even the best at it.

☑ Go to Gamma .app
☑ Create a new deck with AI, from scratch.
☑ Or upload your existing PPT directly there.

This AI combines ChatGPT with custom fine-tuning to create the right slides for your precise needs.

Rookies stick to PowerPoint.
Juniors adopt Canva & ChatGPT.
Professionals master Gamma directly.

PS: I can already feel the haters coming.

"Consultants are not paid for slidedecks."

Well, yes & no.

1. "Consultants spend a significant portion of their time (up to 70%) making slides on PowerPoint."

But also:

2. "AI will automate roughly 30% of tasks in the consulting sector, particularly impacting junior roles focused on data analysis and report preparation."

1. If 70% of the time is spent on presentations...
2. And most of it is done by juniors...

Half of the consultants will be replaced by AI.

And Gamma proves it with 50 million users.
